translations.text: A soldier's practice? Reward and punishment? I know the winner or loser in this way. Will listen to my plan, use it will win, stay, will not listen to my plan, use it will lose, go. Profit to listen, is the trend, to the outside. The powerful, for profit and power also. Soldiers, trickery too. Therefore, can show can not, use and show not use, near and far, far and near.
